00028         enum Font { Helvetica12, Helvetica18 };
00029 
00030 public:
00031 
00032         // Changes the coordinate system to pixel-based 2d coords. The coordinate system viewport will correspond to the
00033         // viewport parameters specified in the draw context.
00034         OUTK_API static void beginOverlayMode(const omega::DrawContext& context);
00035 
00036         // Restores the coordinate system specified before a Begin2DCoords call.
00037         OUTK_API static void endOverlayMode();

00039         // Prints text. 
00040         OUTK_API static void drawText(int x, int y, const char* s, Font f = Helvetica12);
00041 
00042         OUTK_API static void drawSolidTeapot(float size);
00043         OUTK_API static void drawWireTeapot(float size);
00044 
00045         OUTK_API static void drawHGradient(omega::Vector2i pos, omega::Vector2i size, omega::Color startColor, omega::Color endColor, float pc = 0.0f);
00046         OUTK_API static void drawVGradient(omega::Vector2i pos, omega::Vector2i size, omega::Color startColor, omega::Color endColor, float pc = 0.0f);
00047 
00048         OUTK_API static void drawDRect(omega::Vector2f pos, omega::Vector2f size, int d);
00049 private:
